description: Isolated test queries - no conversation history (38 tests)

baseline.description: One straightforward test per intent function (8 tests)

tests.expectedBehavior: Should return day-by-day sales breakdown for May 2025
Should return top 10 items for September 2025 (current month)
Should return breakdown by primary categories (Beer, Sushi, Food, etc)
Should return single total sales number for June 2025
Should return single day with highest sales in July
Should compare weekday vs weekend sales with totals
Should track Salmon Roll sales over time in May
Should compare total sales between two months

edgeCases.description: Edge cases, invalid inputs, boundary conditions (10 tests)

tests.expectedBehavior: Should explain data only available through October 2025
Should handle invalid date gracefully
Should explain no data available for that period
Should handle month boundary correctly (2 days)
Should return single day total
Should handle long date range (10 months)
Should interpret and show June 1-7

tests.query: Saturday and Sunday sales in July 2025
tests.expectedBehavior: Should compare two specific weekend days
Should recognize holiday and return July 4, 2025 sales

tests.query: show me sales for the past 7 days
tests.expectedBehavior: Should calculate relative date range from October 2025

sanityChecks.description: Tests with known expected value ranges to catch logic bugs (8 tests)

tests.expectedBehavior: Weekend sales should be > $0 (validates weekend bug fix)
Weekday sales should be > $0
Both Fridays and Saturdays should have sales > $0

tests.query: best and worst day in July 2025
tests.expectedBehavior: Best day sales should be > worst day sales
May total should be > $0 and match known reports (~$140k)
Sum of categories should approximately equal total sales
Top 1 item should have highest sales

tests.query: compare weekdays in May vs June 2025
tests.expectedBehavior: Both periods should have data and valid comparison

negativeTests.description: Off-topic or unavailable data queries (7 tests)

tests.expectedBehavior: Should politely decline, not an analytics query

tests.query: how many customers visited last week
tests.expectedBehavior: Should explain no customer count data available
Should explain no employee/staffing data
Should explain no reservation data
Should explain only sales analytics available
Should provide sales but explain no satisfaction data
Should politely decline and offer analytics help

boundaryTests.description: Parameter boundary and special character tests (5 tests)

tests.expectedBehavior: Should handle large N, return all available items
Should handle gracefully, ask for valid number
Should handle negative N gracefully
Should handle parentheses in item names
Should normalize to (Beer) category correctly

metadata.purpose: Comprehensive isolated testing with no conversation history to validate function accuracy
